text: When making a pair of socks, or any knit or crochet item, it is always easier when you have the right tools and supplies. I have compiled a list, at multiple price points, of tools and supplies that will help you with your sock making journey. Take a look at this list and see what sock knitting tools and supplies you might want to make your next pair easier.
